company_info.Company Description: Cozmo Travel Pvt LtdLaunched in September 2015 with a vision to offer#11;customised travel solutions for independent and corporate travelers, Cozmo Travel India has#11;fast established a name for itself within India. With a complete range of world-class products and consultancy services that support businesses and individuals alike, Cozmo Travel reflects the perfect blend of global expertise and local knowledge.

api_data.job_title: B2B Sales / Channel Sales / Agency Sales (travel Industry Only)

jd_information.description: Job Description:-· Maintaining Sales and Promotion for company by being very aggressive in markets for selling Air and Non-Air Products (B2B).· Meeting Travel agents and bring in new accounts on regular basis from various cities.· Managing the existing travel Agents accounts and generating regular revenue from them.· Manage & drive multi-city sales team, target planning, distribution & tracking.· Expertise in B2B sales environment navigating corporate processes & dealing with admin managers/ purchase-procurement teams/ HR.· Monitor And Report on All Marketing Activities And Provide Relevant Management Information.· Aggressive to convert sales & achieve targets· Should be ready to travel on daily basis to drive sales· To maintain excellent relationship with Clients and be able to tailor products pitch according to their specificationQualifications and Skills:-· 2-6 years of experience in Sales in Travel Industry· Prefer candidate having experience in B2B Sales from travel agency company
